title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Developing and refining big plans lays the groundwork for your continued success. The New Moon in Libra soars through your 10th House of Reputation, encouraging you to revamp goals and objectives that are stalled or need tweaking to keep going strong. Perhaps talking with a mentor or enlisting the services of a business coach can assist you in obtaining clarity on your next steps. Although youre in it to win it, theres no need to go for it all alone. Learning from someone else's mistakes saves you valuable time. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
